content: this is chilly the penguin a perfect little winter friend or stocking stuffer for any penguin lover chilly is my original amigurumi design and works up quickly your pdf purchase is sent to you as an instant download so you can start crocheting today the digital pattern includes written instructions with step by step photos you will receive directions for crocheting the penguin earmuffs and scarf all patterns are written in english in us crochet terms the finished penguin is about 6 75 tall you ll need -yarn in the colors pictured worsted/aran weight -size e/3 5mm crochet hook -yarn needle -stuffing -safety eyes -an intermediate or ambitious beginner crochet skill level © 2018 crochet to play all rights reserved designed and written by jennifer percival this pattern is property of crochet to play please do not redistribute transfer or sell the pattern or images in part or in whole thank you
